Title: Relates to the use of locomotive bells and whistles at private highway-rail grade crossings
Summary: Relates to the use of locomotive bells and whistles at private highway-rail grade crossings; permits the use of locomotive bells and whistles as appropriate in order to prevent imminent injury, death, or property damage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the railroad law, in relation to the use of locomotive bells and whistles at private highway-rail grade crossings
